nodes.text: Kendamar was a terrestrial planet located in the Kendamar system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Dail sector. Around 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of Kendamari Casinos, a chain of casinos that constituted a part of the Tenloss Syndicate.

Kendamar was first mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Kendamar system, and therefore Kendamar itself, in grid square Q-18.
